title: Fae'lor should be a pin on the map
body: Since Syndra's whole story happened there that should be a pin !

replies.body: This is definitely something we will be adding. We don't have the capacity to update the map as often as we release lore, so sometimes there will be simultaneous content drops, and sometimes the map will catch up with several new items at once.
Also, keep your eyes peeled for Easter Eggs. There are already about SEVEN on there.

> Also, keep your eyes peeled for Easter Eggs. There are already about SEVEN on there.
